Detailed Description

Helper class for receiving notifications from the SensorManager when the orientation of the device has change. 

  class MyOrientationEventListener : public gaia::core::OrientationEventListener {
    public:
        MyOrientationEventListener(gaia::core::Context* context): OrientationEventListener(context) {
            GLOG(LOG_TAG, LOGINFO, "Enter %s", __func__);
        }

        void onOrientationChanged(int32_t orientation) {
             //framework will callback when orientation changed.
            GLOG(LOG_TAG, LOGINFO, "Enter %s %d", __func__, orientation);
        }
  };

  // In your Page OnInit()
  myListener = new MyOrientationEventListener(new Context(this));
  if(myListener->canDetectOrientation()) {
       myListener->enable();
  }

virtual void gaia::core::OrientationEventListener::onOrientationChanged ( int32_t  orientation) [pure virtual]

Called when the orientation of the device has changed.

orientation parameter is in degrees, ranging from 0 to 359. orientation is 0 degrees when the device is oriented in its natural position, 90 degrees when its left side is at the top, 180 degrees when it is upside down, and 270 degrees when its right side is to the top.
